name: Bumble Trouble (itch)
description:
In Bumble Trouble, you play as a young bee defending his hive, from robotic beatles from the evil Dr. Smoker.

Controls:

WASD: To move around

Left-Click: To Shoot

Right-Click: To sting enemies in the rear of you.

Created By: Abu Bangurah, Alex Czaczkowski, Jacob Stade, Trent Toyryla(Yeah Eveyone Was the Programmer).
